amendment.description: To provide for safety improvements on transit systems.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3919 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3919 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Mikulski to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S2814-2815; text: CR S2815) To provide for safety improvements on transit systems.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3919 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Mikulski to Amendment SA 3896.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3919 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
